content: Can someone give this stream a description please
hmm. write one here and I'll apply it. I just did about 50 and my brain is fulll
I'll respond in each stream that you tagged (where i can)
"Stream for discussion about Medical Devices - Using FHIR in medical devices (personal devices, PoC devices) ISO 11073, FHIR resources"

<back from a week break ... was definitely needed> @Grahame Grieve I set up this stream years ago ... gave it its first "description" but that should be updated a bit now - from what I can tell, though, I don't have rights for that anymore ... yes? Or am I just Monday A.M. Lost?
I used the one @Jose Costa Teixeira provided
OK ... but that doesn't reflect the updated scope of HL7 Devices & Devices on FHIR focus.

@Todd Cooper that was what I could think of. I personally didn't think there's much to it, and I'm definitely not attached to that or any other description. I suppose Grahame can update the description if that is a relevant change

No worries, @Jose Costa Teixeira ... my main concern was the focus on "medical devices" - obviously a key part but it is broader Let's try THIS revised version:

""Discussion about the application of FHIR to health device informatics - including the Devices on FHIR (DoF) implementation guides for acute point-of-care medical devices and personal health devices, integrating ISO/IEEE 11073 device interoperability standards""

OK?
I have no preference - so yes from my side
